Text: instead of showing off your gaping asshole logo, why not provide a link or some info about this episode, which doesn't exist on discovery.com or anywhere else?!

I had respect for ya guys, 'tvteam', but that pic up there is a little weird!

you people who think tvteam creates
the files they post don't understand where
the shows and films come from.

they mostly come from scene groups.
tvteam (and others) grabs those files
from the groups and creates a torrent file
and posts it here.

nfo. the nfo you see here was created by

This isn't even labeled correctly. It's not from Discovery Channel, it's the Science Channel. A little more due diligence is needed here. Don't add to the crap that's posted every day. Make sure it's accurate and searchable! People searching for Sci Channel material probably won't find this.
